lines: Fa Kyerɛw Kronkron nsoromma no ma me,
Ahum ntumi nkata ne hyerɛn no so,
Fa Kyerɛw Kronkron asɛmpa no ma me,
Wo hann no bɛwɛn me kwan teaa no mu,
Bɔhyɛ ne mm'ra ne ɔdɔ ahyɛ mu ma,
Kosi sɛ adesae bɛdan daa hann.
Fa Ky'rɛw no ma me b'rč a me koma 'bubu,
Na bɔne de hu ahyɛ me kra so;
Fa 'sɛmpa a Yesu aka no ma me,
Na menka sɛ Agyenkwa no abɛn.
Fa Ky'rɛw no ma me ma ɛnhy'rɛn me kwan so
Ky'rɛ me mmusu a ɛwɔ wiɔase,
Ahotɔ kanea no bɛpam sum nyinaa;
Kanea no nko na ɛky'rɛ 'somdwoe kwan.
